name: WingPong
description:
Everyone dreams about becoming a bird but how about becoming one with ping pong paddles for wings? Maybe even striking dangerous feathers back at enemy ping pong paddle birds mid flight and racking up a high score while at it?

Well, in that case do I have a fun little game for you!

--------------------------

This is the first game I've ever made so keep that in mind while playing :) 

It's just a small little game but everything in it is self-made, including music and sprites, which I'm pretty proud about. I hope you'll enjoy it!
